price: Na mmoja wao akibashiriwa kwa msichana, uso wake unasawijika,naye kajaa chuki.
arabic: وَإِذَا بُشِّرَ أَحَدُهُم بِٱلۡأُنثَىٰ ظَلَّ وَجۡهُهُۥ مُسۡوَدّٗا وَهُوَ كَظِيمٞ
footnotes: Na akiambiwa mmoja wao kwamba amepata mtoto wa kike, uso wake unasawijika kwa huzuni, naye amejaa hasira na amekasirika.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā bushira aḥaduhum bil-unthā ẓalla wajhuhu mus'waddan wahuwa kaẓīmun
